Ebbro 43990 Nissan Skyline Turbo C 1983 Suzuka 1000km (WEC Series) DNF M. Hasemi/K. Tohira

Purchased: 2014

Nissan had a miserable endurance racing season in 1983 - 5 races and 5 DNFs. Ebbro also released the 1983 Fuji car with extra plywood on the doors. A nice model from Ebbro again although it has some ride height issues in the front. :lol:
